Test Name: Virology Diagnostic Tests - Analytical Phase Result Generation
Specimen Type: Patient specimens for virology testing (e.g., respiratory swabs, serum, plasma, CSF)
Purpose: To generate accurate, reliable, and timely results for virology diagnostic tests.
Container: Sterile viral transport medium tube or other appropriate container per specimen type
Equipment: PCR thermal cycler, ELISA reader, cell culture incubator, general analytical instruments
